messages.title: IN TOUCH
messages.content: Community news from Boris Johnson, and your local Conservatives in Manor Ward.

messages.title: INVESTMENT WELCOMED
messages.content: Councillors have secured funding for Manor

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Securing funding for Manor ward, with a focus on community growth and development.
Delivering a faster and more reliable tube service.
Highlighting the effectiveness of the Conservative-run council in Hillingdon.

issues.governance: The residents of Hillingdon benefit from having one of the most effective Conservative-run councils in the country, thanks to Council Leader Cllr Ray Puddifoot and his team.

housing.content: Councillors have secured funding for Manor which indicates development and attention to housing issues in the area.

leaflet.personalStatement: On a recent visit to Manor ward, Conservative parliamentary candidate Boris Johnson commented that the area is going from strength to strength.

images.caption: Councillors with Boris Johnson during his visit to Manor Farm Butchers.

leaflet.additionalNotes: Produced and delivered at no expense to the taxpayer
